=Using YTEX=



==Annotating Documents==

===UIMA Document Analyzer===
 * Execute `YTEX_HOME\ytexDocumentAnalyzer.bat`
 * Select `YTEX_HOME\config\desc\ytex\esld\ESLDPipelineRich.xml` as the annotation engine
 * Select `MAVERIC_HOME\docs\examples\collection` as input directory
 * Create `MAVERIC_HOME\docs\examples\ytexoutput` and set as output directory
 * Run

===UIMA Collection Processing Engine===
 * Execute `YTEX_HOME\ytexCPE.bat`
 * Specify query to retrieve document keys
 * Specify query to retrieve individual document

==Retrieving Documents==

===Using YTEX Views===
Some simple queries:
  * View all documents
{{{
select * 
from ytex.v_document
}}}
  * View all sentences that contain an affirmed UMLS Concept
{{{
select * 
from ytex.v_document_cui_sent
where code = 'C000000'
and certainty = 0
}}}

===Using YTEX DBAnnotationViewer===
  * Execute `YTEX_HOME\ytexDBAnnotationViewer.bat`
  * Select `YTEX_HOME\config\desc\ytex\esld\ESLDPipelineRich.xml` as the annotation engine
  * Specify document id (e.g. from one of the views)
